reviews.review_msg: Overall, it was a good class. Prof is quite rude. Quizzes and discussions are marked strictly, and even minor details will cost you marks. I once cited a range of pages (e.g., 251â€“253) instead of a single page and lost two points, despite the rubric not specifying this requirement lol.

Clear marking scheme for assignments/presentations. Very responsive to emails. There is a strong emphasis on class participation which makes up some of your marks. He likes to bring in guest speakers which I found interesting and unique from other profs. The workload was heavy but it was alright because he and his TA are generous markers.
